---
id: user-management-unlock
title: "User management unlock"
description: "The API allows administrators or authorized users to unlock a user in the system. This action is typically performed when a user is locked due to security reasons or account inactivity."
sidebar_label: "User management unlock"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"User management unlock"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/reset-login-attempts"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allows administrators or authorized users to unlock a user in the system. This action is typically performed when a user is locked due to security reasons or account inactivity.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
